tool_description: An API showing all the current Premier League Players
title: Premier League Players

api_list.name: Get All Players
api_list.description: Gets all the current premier league players.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://premier-league-players1.p.rapidapi.com/players"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "premier-league-players1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
